question_text: Does the legislation require entrepreneurs to have the company name approved by the business registry or by another corresponding public authority in order to register a new business?
indicator_name: Mandatory to Have the Company Name Approved

question_text: Does the legislation provide specific rules for rejecting proposed company names by the business registry or by another corresponding public authority?
indicator_name: Mandatory to Have the Company Name Approved

question_text: Does the legislation require registering changes to the company name at the business registry or another corresponding public authority?
indicator_name: Mandatory to Register Changes to the Company Name

question_text: Does the legislation require verifying the identity of the entrepreneurs willing to start a new company?
indicator_name: Mandatory to Verify the Identity of Entrepreneurs

question_text: Does the legislation require registration of shareholders details at the business registry or at another corresponding public authority?
indicator_name: Mandatory to Register Shareholders' Information

question_text: Does the legislation require registering changes to the shareholders’ details at the business registry or another corresponding public authority?
indicator_name: Mandatory to Register Changes to the Shareholders' Information

question_text: Does the legislation require companies to file annual financial accounts or statements at the business registry or at another corresponding public authority?
indicator_name: Mandatory to File Annual Returns/Financial Statements

question_text: Does the legislation require registering changes in the articles of association at the business registry or at another corresponding public authority?
indicator_name: Mandatory to Register Changes in the Articles of Association

question_text: Does the legislation require new limited liability companies to register beneficial ownership information with a public authority?
indicator_name: Mandatory to Register Beneficial Owners' Information

question_text: Does the legislation require companies to register the following type of information about beneficial owners? Full name
indicator_name: Mandatory Type of Information Required for Beneficial Owners

question_text: Does the legislation require companies to register the following type of information about beneficial owners? Identification number and information
indicator_name: Mandatory Type of Information Required for Beneficial Owners

question_text: Does the legislation require companies to register the following type of information about beneficial owners? Date of birth
indicator_name: Mandatory Type of Information Required for Beneficial Owners

question_text: Does the legislation require companies to register the following type of information about beneficial owners? Address
indicator_name: Mandatory Type of Information Required for Beneficial Owners

question_text: Does the legislation specify a time limit for registering the required beneficial owner information in the case of a newly registered limited liability company?
indicator_name: Mandatory Time Limit to Register Beneficial Owners' Information

question_text: Does the legislation require verifying the identity of beneficial owners during the registration with a public authority?
indicator_name: Mandatory to Verify Beneficial Owners' Identity

question_text: Does the legislation require registering changes to beneficial ownership information with a public authority?
indicator_name: Mandatory to Register Changes to the Beneficial Ownership Information

question_text: Does the legislation allow nominee shareholders and/or directors?
indicator_name: Prohibition or Mandatory to Register Nominee Shareholders and Directors

question_text: Does the legislation require registering their status as nominee shareholders and/or directors with a public authority?
indicator_name: Prohibition or Mandatory to Register Nominee Shareholders and Directors

question_text: Does the legislation allow entrepreneurs to register a limited liability company by themselves, using a simple standard registration form without the mandatory use of third-party intermediaries?
indicator_name: Simple Registration Form Without the Use of Intermediaries

question_text: Does the legislation allow the use of such simple standard registration forms for all entrepreneurs and limited liability companies performing general commercial or industry activities – regardless of the size of the company, country of origin of the founders, etc. – to register a company by themselves without the mandatory use of third-party intermediaries?
indicator_name: Simple Registration Form for All Entrepreneurs

question_text: Does the legislation allow entrepreneurs to make updates to company statutory information by themselves (e.g., through online forms for updates), without the mandatory use of third-party intermediaries?
indicator_name: Changes without the Use of Intermediaries

question_text: Does the legislation allow all entrepreneurs and limited liability companies performing general commercial or industry activity - regardless of the size of the company, country of origin of the founders, etc. - to make updates to company statutory information by themselves, without the mandatory use of third-party intermediaries?
indicator_name: Changes without the Use of Intermediaries

question_text: Does the legislation provide for different business operating licensing requirements depending on the level of risk of the company operations?
indicator_name: Risk-Based Regulations for Business Licensing

question_text: Does the legislation provide for different environmental operating licensing requirements depending on the level of risk of the company?
indicator_name: Risk-Based Regulations for Environmental Licensing

question_text: Does the legislation require a mandated paid-in minimum capital for private limited liability companies owned by domestic entrepreneurs?
indicator_name: Paid-in Minimum Capital Requirements for Domestic Firms

question_text: Does the legislation require domestic entrepreneurs to pay the entirety of the mandated paid-in minimum capital for private limited liability companies prior to registration?
indicator_name: Entirety of Paid-in Minimum Capital Prior to Registration of Domestic Firms

question_text: Does the legislation require any minimum education or training for an entrepreneur to register a limited liability company and begin general business operations?
indicator_name: Minimum Education or Training

question_text: Does the legislation require criminal history records or affidavits from an entrepreneur to register a limited liability company and begin general business operations?
indicator_name: Criminal History Records or Affidavits

question_text: Does the legislation require approval of business plan, feasibility plan, or financial plan for an entrepreneur to register a limited liability company and begin general business operations?
indicator_name: Approval of Business Plan, Feasibility Plan, or Financial Plan

question_text: Does the legislation require a general business operating license to be obtained for an entrepreneur to register a limited liability company and begin general business operations?
indicator_name: General Operating License

question_text: Does the legislation mandate specific requirements for domestic entrepreneurs from different sociodemographic groups (e.g., ethnicity/race, gender, migration status, religious affiliation) who wish to register a company?
indicator_name: Sociodemographic Restrictions for Domestic Entrepreneurs

question_text: Does the legislation mandate specific requirements for domestic entrepreneurs from different sociodemographic groups (e.g., ethnicity/race, gender, migration status, religious affiliation) who wish to open a bank account?
indicator_name: Sociodemographic Restrictions for Domestic Entrepreneurs

question_text: Does the legislation limit full private domestic participation/equity ownership in any business sector?
indicator_name: Sector-Specific Restrictions for Domestic Entrepreneurs

question_text: Does the legislation require a mandated paid-in minimum capital requirement for foreign private limited liability companies owned by foreign entrepreneurs?
indicator_name: Paid-in Minimum Capital Requirements for Foreign Firms

question_text: Does the legislation require foreign entrepreneurs to pay the entirety of the mandated paid-in minimum capital for private limited liability companies prior to registration?
indicator_name: Entirety of Paid-in Minimum Capital Prior to Registration of Foreign Firms

question_text: Does the legislation impose limitations on the proportion of shares that can be held in a company for foreign entrepreneurs?
indicator_name: Ownership and Participation Restrictions

question_text: Does the legislation impose limitations on the number of joint ventures for foreign entrepreneurs?
indicator_name: Ownership and Participation Restrictions

question_text: Does the legislation require investment screening or approval by government authority for foreign entrepreneurs, different from domestic entrepreneurs?
indicator_name: Screening and Approval Requirements

question_text: Does the legislation require minimum size of investment for foreign entrepreneurs, different from the threshold for domestic entrepreneurs?
indicator_name: Screening and Approval Requirements

question_text: Does the legislation have any requirement about the nationality of the management for companies owned by foreign entrepreneurs?
indicator_name: Restrictions on the Nationality of Key Personnel and Directors

question_text: Does the legislation have any requirement about the nationality of the board members for companies owned by foreign entrepreneurs?
indicator_name: Restrictions on the Nationality of Key Personnel and Directors

question_text: Does the legislation impose restrictions on hiring foreign nationals?
indicator_name: Restrictions on Employment of Foreign and Local Personnel

question_text: Does the legislation require minimum number or percentage of national employees?
indicator_name: Restrictions on Employment of Foreign and Local Personnel

question_text: Does the legislation require foreign entrepreneurs to have a local partner?
indicator_name: Local Engagement Requirements

question_text: Does the legislation impose local sourcing requirements for foreign entrepreneurs?
indicator_name: Local Engagement Requirements

question_text: Does the legislation impose limitations on dividend distribution for foreign entrepreneurs?
indicator_name: Financial Restrictions

question_text: Does the legislation impose restrictions on holding a foreign currency commercial bank account?
indicator_name: Financial Restrictions

question_text: Does the legislation limit full private foreign participation/equity ownership in any business sector?
indicator_name: Sector-Specific Restrictions for Foreign Entrepreneurs

question_text: Does an electronic and automated system to verify the uniqueness and compliance of company names exist?
indicator_name: Electronic Company Name Verification

question_text: Does an electronic system that covers the entire company registration process from submitting the application to receiving the company documents exist?
indicator_name: Entirely Electronic Company Registration Process

question_text: Is there a fully electronic system for companies to update their company statutory information?
indicator_name: Electronic Update of Company Information

question_text: Does a fully electronic platform to register and update information on beneficial owners exist?
indicator_name: Electronic Registration and Update of Beneficial Ownership Information

question_text: Does an electronic payment option for all fees related to company incorporation exist?
indicator_name: Electronic Payment of Incorporation Fees

question_text: Does the business registry issue the certificate of company incorporation fully electronically?
indicator_name: Electronic Issuance of Company Incorporation Certificate

question_text: Does the business registry store all company registration records in digital form?
indicator_name: Company Information Records Digitally Stored

indicator_name: Database on Company Information

indicator_name: Database on Company Information

question_text: Does the publicly available company information database at the business registry cover all types of limited liability companies (i.e., regardless of the business activity, size of the company, country of origin of the founders, etc.)?
indicator_name: Database on Company Information

question_text: Is the publicly available beneficial ownership database fully electronic?
indicator_name: Database on Beneficial Ownership

question_text: Is the publicly available beneficial ownership database centralized with full national coverage?
indicator_name: Database on Beneficial Ownership

question_text: Does the publicly available beneficial ownership database cover all types of limited liability companies (i.e., regardless of the business activity, size of the company, country of origin of the founders, etc.)?
indicator_name: Database on Beneficial Ownership

question_text: Is an electronic signature or another electronic form of authentication identification available for online company registration?
indicator_name: Availability of Electronic Signature and Authentication

question_text: Is there an electronic and fully automated process to verify the identity of entrepreneurs at the moment of company registration?
indicator_name: Electronic Identity Verification Process

question_text: Do key public authorities for business entry exchange company information (e.g., company name or address) automatically and electronically?
indicator_name: Exchange of Information among Public Sector Agencies

question_text: Are changes to company information (e.g., changes to company name or address) automatically updated for key public authorities for business entry?
indicator_name: Update of Company Information Fully Automated

question_text: Does the business registry or another corresponding public authority assign a Unique Business Identification number (UBI) for all companies?
indicator_name: Unique Business Identification Number Existence

question_text: Do key public authorities for business entry use the same UBI to identify individual businesses without issuing a separate identification number?
indicator_name: Unique Business Identification Number Used by Key Agencies
